text: Avoca is an unincorporated community in Clay County, in the U.S. state of West Virginia. ==History== A post office called Avoca was in operation from 1906 until 1909. Avoca was named after a place mentioned in Irish Melodies by Thomas Moore. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Clay County, West Virginia Category:Unincorporated communities in West Virginia
title: Avoca, West Virginia
